data.message: I need facebook to contact me about a legacy account.

replies.message: Hi John. You can learn more about legacy contacts in our Help Center: http://on.fb.me/1PXpVzG. Let us know if there's anything else we can help you with. Thanks. -Azaria
Yes, I need the legacy account I was in charge of for my husband transferred to my new account.
I was in charge of xavi Patchouli Aguilar Tedder account.

Thanks for the follow up, John. Unfortunately, we're not able to transfer accounts with legacy contacts. Adding a new account as the legacy contact would require logging-in to the memorialized account, which is against our policy. If you still have access to your original profile, you can continue to manage the account from there.  To learn more about what legacy contacts can and can't do, please visit our Help Center: http://on.fb.me/1PXQepB. Thanks. -Azaria
Okay, then can you help me get into me old deactivate account
Some how my phone number and email are attached to both accounts so I'm not able to pull the other one up.
